version_description:
!!! Important: previous versions will not be supported from March 4, 2016. Please, update before this date. 

+ Introducing Subscriptions
PS Deals is now powered with 1 month or 1 year Premium subscriptions! New Premium features is coming in next releases!
Users who already bought PS Deals Premium will receive lifetime subscription. Just update the app and go to Profile, select Subscribe to Premium and tap Restore Purchase. Thank you for choosing PS Deals :)
+ Fixed log out issue, when user doesn't fully log out after "Log Out" button has been tapped
+ Fixed "Send Feedback" crash on some devices
+ Small UI and UX improvements

!!! Important: previous versions will not be supported from March 4, 2016. Please, update before this date. 

+ Introducing Subscriptions
PS Deals is now powered with 1 month or 1 year Premium subscriptions! New Premium features is coming in next releases!
Users who already bought PS Deals Premium will receive lifetime subscription. Just update the app and go to Profile, select Subscribe to Premium and tap Restore Purchase. Thank you for choosing PS Deals :)
+ Fixed log out issue, when user doesn't fully log out after "Log Out" button has been tapped
+ Fixed "Send Feedback" crash on some devices
+ Small UI and UX improvements

!!! Important: previous versions will not be supported from March 4, 2016. Please, update before this date. 

+ Introducing Subscriptions
PS Deals is now powered with 1 month or 1 year Premium subscriptions! New Premium features is coming in next releases!
Users who already bought PS Deals Premium will receive lifetime subscription. Just update the app and go to Profile, select Subscribe to Premium and tap Restore Purchase. Thank you for choosing PS Deals :)

+ Fixed "Send Feedback" crash on some devices
+ Small UI and UX improvements

We know you are waiting for DLCs and Add-Ons support and they are coming in next release!

However we have many cool upgrades you will love in this release:
* Free account daily limits is back instead of lifetime limit
* Top bar now hides completely when you scroll down, revealing more space for gorgeous games on iPhones
* Games tiles position optimised to use the most of screen dimensions on iPhone
* iPad Pro small optimisations - more games on one screen
* Significantly improved games loading speed and CPU usage reduced. Now progress indicator will not freeze, even for a moment :)
* Pulling down for screenshots gallery working smooth as never before
* Fixed login window popping up on each iPad rotation when user is not logged in

Our team has been working hard over the past two months and now ready to introduce PS Deals v2.0:
* Add-Ons! Yeah, PS Deals now supports add-ons with the same powerful functionality as for single games and bundles - be notified about price drops, explore new add-ons for your favourite games and get detailed description
* No limitations for adding games to WatchList for free accounts, forever!
* Primary store change for free accounts (read warning message carefully, please).
* +15 NEW PS STORES
* Complete redesign & performance improvements

Featured Section:
* Personalised featured section delivers best games based on your store and platforms settings. No more games for platforms you do not own :)
* Games collections. Find what you are looking for with one tap from main screen! Always up-to-date collections - new games, new add-ons, free with PS+, top rated games on sale, will be released, demos & timed trials, free to play, etc.. We will add more collections in future, stay tuned ;)
* News moved to featured section.

Discounts & All Games Sections:
* New & Powerful Filters. Filter your results by content type, genre, release date, price, stores and platforms. Filters can be accessed with button in upper right corner or by sliding top panel down.
* Game tiles now have badges with content type.
* All Games and Search sections are combined together and accessed from bottom tab bar by “All Games” button.

Game’s Details Page:
* Add-Ons section. Displays add-ons available for game (with their number)
* Parent game section. Shows the parent game to which bundle or add-on belongs (with ability to proceed to parent game)

* Fixed crash on iOS 9.1 and possible crash on other iOS versions when user accessed game which contains add-ons
* Improved items positioning in add-on list (game's page)
* Featured section auto-reload if it previously was unable to load results
* Other minor bug fixes

* Fixed crash on iOS 9.1 and possible crash on other iOS versions when user accessed game which contains add-ons
* Improved items positioning in add-on list (game's page)
* Featured section auto-reload if it previously was unable to load results
* Other minor bug fixes

* Fixed crash on iOS 9.1 and possible crash on other iOS versions when user accessed game which contains add-ons
* Improved items positioning in add-on list (game's page)
* Featured section auto-reload if it previously was unable to load results
* Other minor bug fixes

- No ads, forever. Purchase any Premium Subscription and ads will never appear in the app, even if you won't renew the subscription later.
* Lifetime ads removal is available starting with this update for all Premium Accounts with new, active or expired Premium Subscription. You must be logged in to your account to make it works.
- We are absolutely ready for PlayStation™ VR games' price tracking. The very first game is already available in the app!
- Quick Game Search field is added to the Featured section.
- Fixed wrong images in the News.
- UI improvements and minor bug fixes.
- PS Deals PRO is renamed PS Deals+, so not to mislead you about functionality. It still includes 14 Days Premium and it’s absolutely Ads Free.

Currently we are working on the next big update. If you have ideas how to improve PS Deals feel free to contact us at support@bigga.me. For bug reports or help use the same email (not Reviews in the App Store), so we can investigate the issue and reply to you directly. Thank you for using PS Deals!

* New games layout - check game's screenshot, rating and release date right in feed! Switch "old - new" layouts by tapping on a grid button in a header.
* New layout is supported in Collections too.
* More games are loaded with screenshots. Heh, we are doing our best to make you impressed with new layout ;)
* Bug fixes

If you have ideas on how to improve PS Deals - feel free to contact us at support@bigga.me. For bug reports or help use the same email (not Reviews in the App Store), so we can investigate the issue and reply to you directly.

Hello, hardcore gamers! Here is a not-so-small list of updates for you:
* Add-Ons are unlocked for all accounts (Free and Premium) - access about 80,000 Add-Ons in each region!
* Marketplaces!!! Compare PlayStation Store prices with other marketplaces. Amazon.com (US) and Amazon.de (DE) currently supported. We will add even more soon!
* Stickers pack - add gaming feel to your iMessage app with a cute supergirl from the stickers pack!
* Purchases list - add games you already own to your purchases list.
* Recommendations - PS Deals now builds games & add-ons recommendations based on what you track and a dozen of other factors.
* Games you've added to Watch list, Wish list & Purchases list are now marked with appropriate icons everywhere through the app.
* Quick ALL/GAMES/ADD-ONS change - we have moved a content type filter near to region and platforms buttons for a quick access.
* Search improved
* Lots of small UI changes and improvements
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

If you have ideas on how to improve PS Deals - feel free to contact us at support@bigga.me. For bug reports or help use the same email (not Reviews in the App Store, please), so we can investigate the issue and reply to you directly.
Thank you for using PS Deals!

Thank you for using PS Deals!

* Price Stats
Price Stats section is redesigned and received new Premium feature - Detailed Price Stats, where you can check highest/lowest/average prices, full price history, how many times and when the game (or add-on) was on sale. We will also give our suggestions if you should buy it now based on all stats we carefully gather. 
* 3D Touch Enabled
Preview game with 3D touch without actually opening it! Also try to hard press on PS Deals icon before opening the app.
You will need iPhone 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus to try it.
* Ratings
Ratings section now shows Metascore, Metacritic users score, PlayStation rating with critics and votes numbers in one place. We also have improved fetching of Metacritic score. And even if we can't do this automatically you can go to the search directly from the app.
* Cheats
Yeah-yeah... come on, we know you use them sometimes! Check them in "Info" section.
* More Videos
Now you can browse YouTube for even more video reviews right from the app.
* ESRB ratings
So parents can make informed choices
* UI Improvements
* Bug fixes

If you have ideas on how to improve PS Deals - feel free to contact us at support@bigga.me. For bug reports or help use the same email (not Reviews in the App Store, please), so we can investigate the issue and reply to you directly.
Thank you for using PS Deals!

Welcome PSDeals.net - web version for your Desktop and Android devices. Visit psdeals.net in any browser - it looks and feels like native mobile app!

New in this update:
* Default Content Types
Tired to switch from “ALL” to “GAMES” or “ADD-ONS”? Change “Default content type” in “Profile” tab and PS Deals will always launch with preferred setting by default.

* Landscape View on iPhones
Did you try to rotate PS Deals while watching video or browsing screenshots? No? Ok, don’t do this until you update to the latest version ;)

* Ads Balancing
We know PS Deals isn’t perfect… It isn’t because of ads!
We reduced the amount of pop-ups and balanced the amount of ads displayed across the app (less in lists, but appear in games pages sometimes). We can’t remove ads completely, but this change should improve your experience. And don’t forget - Premium subscription will remove ads completely, even if you won’t renew it later.

* Open in Safari
Open any game or add-on in Safari or share link with friend. You’ll find new buttons in the bottom of every game page.

* Bug fixes

If you have ideas on how to improve PS Deals - feel free to contact us at support@bigga.me. For bug reports or help use the same email (not Reviews in the App Store, please), so we can investigate the issue and reply to you directly.
Thank you for using PS Deals!

We hope you are enjoying PS Deals and this hot summer! We were locked in an air-conditioned office so we could finally make the biggest update this year...
And we are pleased to announce all changes:
* 11 NEW REGIONS: Argentina, Austria, Chile, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Indonesia, Israel, New Zealand, Slovakia and South Africa.
* Highly requested Push Notifications Settings - turn on/off any kind of notifications. Go to "Profile"->"Push Notifications Settings".
* Highly requested Sorting in lists - now you can sort games & add-ons in your Watch list, Wish list and Purchases list by date added, title, discount, rating, release date or price.
* Desired Price - set the desired price for game/add-on and receive notifications only when it passes the threshold. Available for Premium Users.
* 1-Month Premium Subscription is back!
* Auto-renewable Subscriptions - we are changing PS Deals Subscription options to auto-renewable, to make your Premium experience even better. Subscription can be canceled anytime. This applies to newly purchased subscription. Current active subscriptions are not affected by this change and won't auto-renew at the end of the term.
* "New" badge in Discounts tab - to let you know what games and add-ons were discounted in the past 24 hours.
* Video Reviews Titles - much easier to choose what review you'd like to watch next.
* External Links Settings - open video reviews in Youtube native app, websites and PSN Store in Safari. Go to "Profile"->"Links".
* Some bug fixes and design improvements.

This applies to newly purchased subscription. Current active subscriptions are not affected by this change and won't auto-renew at the end of the term.
* "New" badge in Discounts tab - to let you know what games and add-ons were discounted in the past 24 hours.
* Video Reviews Titles - much easier to choose what review you'd like to watch next.
* External Links Settings - open video reviews in Youtube native app, websites and PSN Store in Safari. Go to "Profile"->"Links".
* Some bug fixes and design improvements.

Important update:
Support for iOS 11
iPad Pro 10.5" grid contains 4 games in a row now
Full support for upcoming iPhone X
Bug fixes and stability improvements

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available PS Deals features.
This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Full iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max & iPhone XR support.
This update also contains some tweaks, optimizations and bugs fixes.

This update contains some tweaks, optimizations and bugs fixes. 
Also:
- The content type is now “GAMES” by default. If you’d like to change it back, go to Profile -> Default Content Type -> Choose ALL, GAMES or ADD-ONS
- Filters are now available in Collections

- The content type is now “GAMES” by default. If you’d like to change it back, go to Profile -> Default Content Type -> Choose ALL, GAMES or ADD-ONS
- Filters are now available in Collections

Full iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max & iPhone XR support.
This update also contains some tweaks, optimizations and bugs fixes.
